edu.cnm.deepdive.finalexam

Class PayoutTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.finalexam.PayoutTable

  • public class PayoutTable
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates a simple Keno payout table, driven by values found in a specified file.
    Author:
    Nicholas Bennett

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PayoutTable(java.nio.file.Path payoutsPath)
      Reads a payout table from a specified path.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int get(int numPicked, int numMatched)
      Returns payout (against a $1 bet) for specified number of picks and number of matches (aka the "catch").
      int maxPickSize()
      Returns maximum of payout length.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PayoutTable

        public PayoutTable(java.nio.file.Path payoutsPath)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a payout table from a specified path. Line N (zero-based) in the table is assumed to contain the (N + 1) payouts for 0 through N values matched (aka the "catch"). Within a line, values are assumed to be whitespace-separated integers.
        Parameters:
        payoutsPath - location of payout file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if payout file cannot be found or read.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public int get(int numPicked,
               int numMatched)
        Returns payout (against a $1 bet) for specified number of picks and number of matches (aka the "catch").
        Parameters:
        numPicked - number of values picked.
        numMatched - number of picks matching the numbers drawn.
        Returns:
        payout

      • maxPickSize

        public int maxPickSize()
        Returns maximum of payout length.
        Returns:
        maxPickSize number of picks
